errors.invalid_username: Username must be minimum 4 characters, maximum 15 and only alphabetic and digit characters
errors.email_isregistered: This email is already used by another user
errors.invalid_password: Password must be at least 6 characters long and only alphabetic and digit characters
errors.terms_notaccepted: You must agree with our Terms and Conditions
errors.invalid_firstname: Firstname must be minimum 2 characters, maximum 20 and only alphabetic characters
errors.invalid_lastname: Lastname must be minimum 2 characters, maximum 20 and only alphabetic characters
errors.invalid_company_name: Company name must be minimum 2 characters, maximum 30 and only alphabetic and digit characters
errors.invalid_phone: Phone number must be in right format, starting with + or 8 and only digit characters
errors.invalid_cell_phone: Cell phone number must be in right format, starting with + or 8 and only digit characters
errors.invalid_icq: ICQ number must be in right format, minimum 5 characters, maximum 13 and only digit characters
errors.empty_youtube_url: YouTube link must be not empty
errors.already_posted_youtube_url: You have already posted this YouTube video
errors.empty_youtube_title: YouTube video title must be not empty
errors.empty_youtube_description: YouTube video description must be not empty
errors.empty_youtube_tags: YouTube video tags must have minimum one tag
errors.restricted_youtube_tags: YouTube video tags contains restricted characters
errors.empty_listing_title: Listing title must be not empty
errors.empty_listing_description: Listing description must be not empty
errors.empty_listing_tags: Listing tags must have minimum one tag
errors.empty_date: Expiration date must be not empty
errors.no_emails_to_send: Please enter at least one email address to send Invitation to!
errors.timelimit_invitation: The system doesn't allow users to send invitation less then every 15 minutes. Please wait for this period of time before sending another pack of invitations!
errors.not_authorized_error: You are no authorized to adding comments!
errors.char_poor_comment_error: Your comment must contain not less than 5 characters!
